      • levelPointSpend

        public void levelPointSpend(int type)
        Spend level points You can spend them on 3 types of advantages. Type 0 to gain extra HP Type 1 to gain extra attack modifier, which enlarges your attack Type 2 to enlarge you chances of getting critical hit
